com.cleo.lexicom.edi

Class EDIFilterInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • java.io.FilterInputStream
        • com.cleo.lexicom.edi.EDIFilterInputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class EDIFilterInputStream
extends java.io.FilterInputStream
    Filters an input stream through an EDI detector/parser and makes extracted EDI segments available for inspection via process() method
